typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CompanyName as string,
		CanEdit as string,
		ShowPrice as string,
		ResourceExternalRefs as string,
		EquipmentDetails as string,
		ResourceNameFull as string,
		CapacityUnitId as string,
		CapacityRatioRock as double,
		CapacityRatioSoil as double,
		CapacityRatioClay as double,
		MeasureTon as string,
		FuelType as integer,
		FuelCapacity as integer,
		FuelConsumptionHour as double,
		FuelConsumptionCalculated as double,
		FuelStatus as double,
		FuelLastRefill as string,
		CostVariable as double,
		CostPriceCalculated as double,
		CostCalcDate as string,
		RunCostCalculation as string,
		CostPrice as double,
		MeasureTrips as string,
		Price as double,
		AnnualInspectedDate as string,
		AnnualInspectionDueEmail as string,
		InsuranceExpiryDate as string,
		BuildYear as integer,
		EmissionClass as string,
		PurchasedDate as string,
		HourMeterInitial as integer,
		HourMeter as double,
		ServiceDate as string,
		ServiceHour as integer,
		ServiceHourInterval as integer,
		ServiceHourDueWarning as integer,
		ServiceDueEmail as string,
		SerialNumber as string,
		EngineNumber as string,
		RegistrationNumber as string,
		Equipment as string,
		MachineId as string,
		{Type.TypeId} as string,
		{Type.Description} as string,
		{Type.BaseType} as integer,
		{Type.IsLoader} as string,
		{Type.IsDumper} as string,
		{Type.Id} as string,
		{Type.CompanyId} as integer,
		{Type.RecVersion} as integer,
		{Type.CompanyIds} as string,
		ResourceNumber as integer,
		Description as string,
		ProjIdCurrent as string,
		LocationText as string,
		GPSLocation as string,
		ResponsibleId as string,
		Weight as double,
		Capacity as double,
		GeoCoordinate as string,
		AvatarImageId as string,
		AllowMultiTrans as string,
		Note as string,
		EquipmentTrainingEquipmentRef as string,
		Active as string,
		ModifiedAt as string,
		ModifiedByUserId as string,
		CreatedAt as string,
		CreatedByUserId as string,
		Id as string,
		CompanyId as integer,
		RecVersion as integer,
		CompanyIds as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{ResourceExternalRefs.ResourceNumber} as string,
		{ResourceExternalRefs.ExternalRefType} as string,
		{ResourceExternalRefs.ExternalRefValue} as string,
		{ResourceExternalRefs.Id} as string,
		{ResourceExternalRefs.CompanyId} as string,
		{ResourceExternalRefs.CompanyIds} as string,
		{ResourceExternalRefs.RecVersion} as integer,
		CompanyName as string,
		CanEdit as string,
		ShowPrice as string,
		ResourceExternalRefs as string,
		ResourceNameFull as string,
		CapacityUnitId as string,
		CapacityRatioRock as double,
		CapacityRatioSoil as double,
		CapacityRatioClay as double,
		MeasureTon as string,
		FuelType as integer,
		FuelCapacity as integer,
		FuelConsumptionHour as double,
		FuelConsumptionCalculated as double,
		FuelStatus as double,
		FuelLastRefill as string,
		CostVariable as double,
		CostPriceCalculated as double,
		CostCalcDate as string,
		RunCostCalculation as string,
		CostPrice as double,
		MeasureTrips as string,
		Price as double,
		AnnualInspectedDate as string,
		InsuranceExpiryDate as string,
		BuildYear as integer,
		EmissionClass as string,
		PurchasedDate as string,
		HourMeterInitial as integer,
		HourMeter as double,
		ServiceDate as string,
		ServiceHour as integer,
		ServiceHourDueWarning as integer,
		ServiceHourInterval as integer,
		SerialNumber as string,
		EngineNumber as string,
		RegistrationNumber as string,
		MachineId as string,
		{Type.TypeId} as string,
		{Type.Description} as string,
		{Type.BaseType} as integer,
		{Type.IsLoader} as string,
		{Type.IsDumper} as string,
		{Type.Id} as string,
		{Type.CompanyId} as integer,
		{Type.RecVersion} as integer,
		ResourceNumber as string,
		Description as string,
		ProjIdCurrent as string,
		LocationText as string,
		GPSLocation as string,
		ResponsibleId as string,
		Weight as double,
		Capacity as double,
		GeoCoordinate as string,
		AvatarImageId as string,
		AllowMultiTrans as string,
		Note as string,
		EquipmentTrainingEquipmentRef as string,
		Active as string,
		ModifiedAt as string,
		ModifiedByUserId as string,
		CreatedAt as string,
		CreatedByUserId as string,
		Id as string,
		CompanyId as integer,
		RecVersion as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE Machine'],
	postSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE MachineNew'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkNewData
